name.ja: <ruby>Ｍ・ＨＥＲＯ<rt>マスクドヒーロー</rt></ruby> ダスク・クロウ

text.en: If this card is in your hand: You can banish 1 "HERO" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Masked HERO" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, except "Masked HERO Dusk Crow". You can only use each effect of "Masked HERO Dusk Crow" once per turn.

ja.set_name: Tactical-Try Pack: Dark Magic / HERO / Mikanko
